updates.contents: The situation has improved as engineers have brought additional provisioning capacity online for this service. We expect to have it resolved for all users shortly.
updates.title: Issues provisioning legacy shared databases

updates.contents:
We're currently experiencing an issue provisioning legacy shared databases. Users will experience failures creating new Bamboo apps or performing an initial git push to Cedar apps that use these databases.

The newer `cf-postgresql:dev` plan is unaffected. Running apps are also unaffected.

As a workaround for Cedar apps, you can enable the [Cloud Foundry Labs feature `default-cf-postgresql-dev`](https://devcenter.cf.com/articles/labs-default-cf-postgresql-dev), which will use the newer dev database.
updates.title: Issues provisioning legacy shared databases

updates.contents:
We're seeing timeouts provisioning new Bamboo apps. Engineers are investigating.

Running applications are not affected.
updates.title: Issues creating Bamboo apps

updates.contents: We're seeing timeouts provisioning new Bamboo apps.  We are investigating.
updates.title: Issues creating Bamboo apps
